cause.description:
Would you not agree that the USA is the greatest nation on Earth? And, would you not agree that the rest of the world would do better to adopt the same ideals that inspired our nation? Lastly, would you not agree that being granted US statehood has generally benefitted each of the presently fifty states in our land?
Then, you might also agree that it would benefit the world if the USA controlled more of it that it presently does.
1. The USA is presently the greatest nation on Earth?
2. The rest of the world would do better to adopt the same ideals that inspired the birth of the USA.
3. Being granted US statehood has generally benefitted each of the USA's presently fifty states.
cause.mission: to promote the idea that the world would generally be better-off if the USA controlled it entirely
cause.name: The USA should take over the world
